original_text: And when he hath taken away the multitude, his heart shall be lifted up; and he shall cast down many ten thousands: but he shall not be strengthened by it.
korean_text: 그가 큰 무리를 사로잡은 후에 그의 마음이 스스로 높아져서 수만 명을 엎드러뜨릴 것이나 그 세력은 더하지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And when he hath taken away the multitude
his heart shall be lifted up
and he shall cast down many ten thousands
but he shall not be strengthened by it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그것으로 인해 강해지지 않으리라
